mapper.sql: Y.MDT_YN, Y.UPLOAD_YN, Y.SEND_CNT, Y.MSG_NO, Y.ORGN_SEND_YN, Z.DOC_GRP_NAME, IFNULL(Z.APPL_NO,0) APPL_NO, IFNULL(Z.DOC_SEQ, 0) DOC_SEQ, Y.CODE_VAL as DOC_ITEM_NAME, Y.CODE_VAL_XXEN as DOC_ITEM_NAME_XXEN, Y.DOC_TYPE_CODE, Y.DOC_GRP, Y.DOC_ITEM_CODE, Z.DOC_NAME, Z.FILE_EXT, Z.IMG_YN, Z.FILE_PATH, Z.FILE_NAME, Z.ORG_FILE_NAME
APPL_NO, DOC_SEQ, DOC_ITEM_CODE, DOC_ITEM_NAME, DOC_NAME, FILE_EXT, IMG_YN, FILE_PATH, FILE_NAME, ORG_FILE_NAME, CRE_ID, CRE_DATE, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT A.DOC_ITEM_CODE, B.CODE_VAL AS ITEM_NAME, B.CODE_VAL_XXEN AS ITEM_NAME_XXEN, A.DOC_TYPE_CODE, C.CODE_VAL AS TYPE_NAME, A.UPLOAD_YN, A.MSG_NO, A.CHK_CND FROM ADMS_MDT A, COMM_CODE B, COMM_CODE C WHERE A.DOC_ITEM_CODE = B.CODE AND B.CODE_GRP = 'DOC_ITEM' AND A.DOC_TYPE_CODE = C.CODE AND C.CODE_GRP = 'DOC_TYPE' AND A.DOC_TYPE_CODE = #{docTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ADMS_NO = #{admsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.DOC_ITEM_CODE, B.CODE_VAL AS ITEM_NAME, B.CODE_VAL_XXEN AS ITEM_NAME_XXEN, A.DOC_TYPE_CODE, C.CODE_VAL AS TYPE_NAME, A.UPLOAD_YN, A.MSG_NO, A.CHK_CND FROM ADMS_MDT A, COMM_CODE B, COMM_CODE C WHERE A.DOC_ITEM_CODE = B.CODE AND B.CODE_GRP = 'DOC_ITEM' AND A.DOC_TYPE_CODE = C.CODE AND C.CODE_GRP = 'DOC_TYPE' AND A.DOC_TYPE_CODE = #{docTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ADMS_NO = #{admsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.DOC_ITEM_CODE IN
${docItemCode}

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT C.APPL_NO, A.MDT_YN, A.UPLOAD_YN, A.DOC_TYPE_CODE, A.DOC_ITEM_CODE, 0 as DOC_GRP, A.SEND_CNT, A.MSG_NO, A.ORGN_SEND_YN, B.CODE_VAL, B.CODE_VAL_XXEN FROM ADMS_MDT A, COMM_CODE B, APPL C WHERE A.ADMS_NO = C.ADMS_NO AND A.DOC_TYPE_CODE = '00001' AND A.DOC_ITEM_CODE = B.CODE AND B.CODE_GRP = 'DOC_ITEM' AND C.APPL_NO = #{applNo} ) Y LEFT OUTER JOIN APPL_DOC Z ON Y.DOC_TYPE_CODE = Z.DOC_TYPE_CODE AND Y.DOC_GRP = Z.DOC_GRP AND Y.DOC_ITEM_CODE = Z.DOC_ITEM_CODE AND Y.APPL_NO = Z.APPL_NO

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT C.APPL_NO, A.MDT_YN, A.UPLOAD_YN, A.DOC_TYPE_CODE, A.DOC_ITEM_CODE, 0 as DOC_GRP, A.SEND_CNT, A.MSG_NO, A.ORGN_SEND_YN, B.CODE_VAL, B.CODE_VAL_XXEN FROM ADMS_MDT A, COMM_CODE B, APPL C, APPL_ACAD D WHERE A.ADMS_NO = C.ADMS_NO AND A.DOC_TYPE_CODE = '00002' AND A.DOC_ITEM_CODE = B.CODE AND B.CODE_GRP = 'DOC_ITEM' AND C.APPL_NO = D.APPL_NO AND D.SCHL_CNTR_CODE != '118' AND C.APPL_NO = #{applNo} ) Y -- 입학지원번호 LEFT OUTER JOIN APPL_DOC Z ON Y.DOC_TYPE_CODE = Z.DOC_TYPE_CODE AND Y.DOC_GRP = Z.DOC_GRP AND Y.DOC_ITEM_CODE = Z.DOC_ITEM_CODE AND Y.APPL_NO = Z.APPL_NO

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT C.APPL_NO, A.MDT_YN, A.UPLOAD_YN, A.DOC_TYPE_CODE, A.DOC_ITEM_CODE, 0 as DOC_GRP, A.SEND_CNT, A.MSG_NO, A.ORGN_SEND_YN, B.CODE_VAL, B.CODE_VAL_XXEN FROM ADMS_MDT A, COMM_CODE B, APPL C, APPL_ACAD D WHERE A.ADMS_NO = C.ADMS_NO AND A.DOC_TYPE_CODE = '00003' AND A.DOC_ITEM_CODE = B.CODE AND B.CODE_GRP = 'DOC_ITEM' AND C.APPL_NO = D.APPL_NO AND D.ACAD_TYPE_CODE = '00002' AND IFNULL(A.CHN_YN,'') IN ( '', IF(D.SCHL_CNTR_CODE='141','Y','') ) AND C.APPL_NO = #{applNo} ) Y -- 입학지원번호 LEFT OUTER JOIN APPL_DOC Z ON Y.DOC_TYPE_CODE = Z.DOC_TYPE_CODE AND Y.DOC_GRP = Z.DOC_GRP AND Y.DOC_ITEM_CODE = Z.DOC_ITEM_CODE AND Y.APPL_NO = Z.APPL_NO

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT C.APPL_NO, A.MDT_YN, A.UPLOAD_YN, A.DOC_TYPE_CODE, A.DOC_ITEM_CODE, D.ACAD_SEQ as DOC_GRP, A.SEND_CNT, A.MSG_NO, A.ORGN_SEND_YN, B.CODE_VAL, B.CODE_VAL_XXEN FROM ADMS_MDT A, COMM_CODE B, APPL C, APPL_ACAD D WHERE A.ADMS_NO = C.ADMS_NO AND A.DOC_TYPE_CODE = '00004' AND A.DOC_ITEM_CODE = B.CODE AND B.CODE_GRP = 'DOC_ITEM' AND C.APPL_NO = D.APPL_NO AND D.ACAD_TYPE_CODE = '00003' AND IFNULL(A.CHN_YN,'') IN ( '', IF(D.SCHL_CNTR_CODE='141','Y','') ) AND C.APPL_NO = #{applNo} ) Y -- 입학지원번호 LEFT OUTER JOIN APPL_DOC Z ON Y.DOC_TYPE_CODE = Z.DOC_TYPE_CODE AND Y.DOC_GRP = Z.DOC_GRP AND Y.DOC_ITEM_CODE = Z.DOC_ITEM_CODE AND Y.APPL_NO = Z.APPL_NO

SELECT Y.MDT_YN, Y.UPLOAD_YN, Y.SEND_CNT, Y.MSG_NO, Y.ORGN_SEND_YN, Z.DOC_GRP_NAME, IFNULL(Z.APPL_NO,0) APPL_NO, IFNULL(Z.DOC_SEQ, 0) DOC_SEQ, Y.EXAM_NAME as DOC_ITEM_NAME, Y.EXAM_NAME as DOC_ITEM_NAME_XXEN, Y.DOC_TYPE_CODE, Y.DOC_GRP, Y.DOC_ITEM_CODE, Z.DOC_NAME, Z.FILE_EXT, Z.IMG_YN, Z.FILE_PATH, Z.FILE_NAME, Z.ORG_FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT B.APPL_NO, A.MDT_YN, A.UPLOAD_YN, A.DOC_TYPE_CODE, A.DOC_ITEM_CODE, C.LANG_SEQ as DOC_GRP, A.SEND_CNT, A.MSG_NO, A.ORGN_SEND_YN, D.EXAM_NAME FROM ADMS_MDT A, APPL B, APPL_LANG C, LANG_EXAM D WHERE A.ADMS_NO = B.ADMS_NO AND A.DOC_TYPE_CODE = '00005' AND B.APPL_NO = C.APPL_NO AND C.LANG_EXAM_CODE = D.EXAM_CODE AND C.APPL_NO = #{applNo} ) Y -- 입학지원번호 LEFT OUTER JOIN APPL_DOC Z ON Y.DOC_TYPE_CODE = Z.DOC_TYPE_CODE AND Y.DOC_GRP = Z.DOC_GRP AND Y.DOC_ITEM_CODE = Z.DOC_ITEM_CODE AND Y.APPL_NO = Z.APPL_NO

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT C.APPL_NO, A.MDT_YN, A.UPLOAD_YN, A.DOC_TYPE_CODE, A.DOC_ITEM_CODE, 0 as DOC_GRP, A.SEND_CNT, A.MSG_NO, A.ORGN_SEND_YN, B.CODE_VAL, B.CODE_VAL_XXEN FROM ADMS_MDT A, COMM_CODE B, APPL C WHERE A.ADMS_NO = C.ADMS_NO AND A.DOC_TYPE_CODE = '00006' AND A.DOC_ITEM_CODE = B.CODE AND B.CODE_GRP = 'DOC_ITEM' AND C.APPL_ATTR_CODE = '00002' AND C.APPL_NO = #{applNo} ) Y -- 입학지원번호 LEFT OUTER JOIN APPL_DOC Z ON Y.DOC_TYPE_CODE = Z.DOC_TYPE_CODE AND Y.DOC_GRP = Z.DOC_GRP AND Y.DOC_ITEM_CODE = Z.DOC_ITEM_CODE AND Y.APPL_NO = Z.APPL_NO

SELECT
FROM ( SELECT D.APPL_NO, A.MDT_YN, A.UPLOAD_YN, A.DOC_TYPE_CODE, A.DOC_ITEM_CODE, 0 as DOC_GRP, A.SEND_CNT, A.MSG_NO, A.ORGN_SEND_YN, B.CODE_VAL, B.CODE_VAL_XXEN FROM ADMS_CORS_MAJ_MDT A, COMM_CODE B, ADMS_CORS C, APPL D WHERE A.ADMS_CORS_NO = C.ADMS_CORS_NO AND A.DOC_ITEM_CODE = B.CODE AND B.CODE_GRP = 'DOC_ITEM' AND C.ADMS_NO = D.ADMS_NO AND C.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE AND C.CORS_TYPE_CODE = D.CORS_TYPE_CODE AND IFNULL(C.ARI_INST_CODE,'') = IFNULL(D.ARI_INST_CODE,'') AND A.DETL_MAJ_CODE = D.DETL_MAJ_CODE AND D.APPL_NO = #{applNo} ) Y -- 입학지원번호 LEFT OUTER JOIN APPL_DOC Z ON Y.DOC_TYPE_CODE = Z.DOC_TYPE_CODE AND Y.DOC_GRP = Z.DOC_GRP AND Y.DOC_ITEM_CODE = Z.DOC_ITEM_CODE AND Y.APPL_NO = Z.APPL_NO

SELECT A.DOC_TYPE_CODE, A.DOC_GRP, 1 as SEND_CNT, A.DOC_ITEM_CODE, A.DOC_ITEM_NAME, A.DOC_ITEM_NAME AS DOC_ITEM_NAME_XXEN, A.DOC_NAME, A.FILE_EXT, A.IMG_YN, A.FILE_PATH, A.FILE_NAME, A.ORG_FILE_NAME FROM APPL_DOC A WHERE A.DOC_TYPE_CODE = '00009' AND A.APPL_NO = #{applNo}-- 입학지원번호
